liberator-title.author: Fantasy Flight Games
liberator-title.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
liberator-title.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
liberator-title.name: Liberator
liberator-title.ability:
You gain 1 additional :fleet-command: icon in you upgrade bar.
You cannot equip this card if you have a :fleet-command: icon in your upgrade bar.
You cannot spend a command token to resolve a :fleet-command: card's effect.
